mapper.select:
select u_id, u_account, u_nickName, u_avatar,u_isfalse, u_profession, u_hobby, u_province, u_city, attention_number,fans_number,u_password,
from t_user where u_account = #{u_account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM t_user WHERE is_Top = #{is_Top,javaType=INTEGER} ORDER BY top_time DESC

SELECT
FROM t_user WHERE u_nickName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{u_nickName}), '%')
ORDER BY top_time DESC
